attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sick of cars racing along Busk Lane in Church Fenton.
The street is full of children and family pets, and it's only going to be so long before a accident occurs.
we need a speed camera or speed bumps at least!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
